body: We can all agree that that the emotional crying really touched our hearts.

ugh the straights are at it again
There's a gender bender tag that i dint notice.......
@mischirusan Well canon ships are the best ships, at least imo
Remember, kids, Gender Bender is still gay.

..You know, I'm usually at least mildly offended when canonicly straight guys are shipped as gay, and a little less offended when two girl canonically striaght are shipped as lesbians (I'm aware of the hypocrisy here, and am mildly annoyed at myself that I am in the first place) But shipping two guys who are canonically gay as lesbians apparently offends me more than any of the above. Weird. I'll have to see if i can find a pair of canonically lesbians girls shipped together as gay guys and see if that upsets me more or less than this.   I wonder if I'm just offended by people clearly not being able to take established canon character relationships as they are, regardless of the gender pairing?

again... why am i rereading it again? this is like listening to a song you have found enjoyable that you would repeat it over and over again until you hate the song... ugh... brain.. how do you work?!

hey i really enjoyed the normal romance behind this.
